ygData.subject: RE: My thoughts on pricing
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually there are at least 5 different factions.  There are the gnome factions:  eldritch collective, gem choppers, and dark reflection.  There are also at
ygData.messageBody:
Actually there are at least 5 different factions. There are the gnome
factions: eldritch collective, gem choppers, and dark reflection. There
are also at least two different clockwork factions for regular clockworks
and the rogue clockworks. I also believe there is an Ak'Anon merchants
faction that overlaps to a certain extent between the gnomes and the
clockworks.

-----Original Message-----
From: Catbik Tinkerton [mailto:catbik@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 19, 1999 10:56 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re:[EQ_Tinkering] My thoughts on pricing


From: "Catbik Tinkerton" <catbik@...>

>Um, I ran into a clockwork merchant in the Magician Guild who would not
>sell
>to me because of my reputation...
>later I was able to buy from this merchant...
>so faction does seem to effect clockwerk merchants as well

I was just guessing about the faction thing, for some reason the clockworks
regard me indifferently and the gnomes regard me warmly or amiably or
something... maybe the clockworks are moneyhuggers who just like to charge
more =)

Catbik
